CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Bulk heterojunction solar cells were fabricated with configuration of ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC71BM / TiO x / Al.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| ------------ |
| ITO         |
| PEDOT : PSS  |
| polymer     |
| PC71BM      |
| TiO x       |
| Al          |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| ------------ |
| ITO         |
| PEDOT : PSS  |
| polymer     |
| PC71BM      |
| TiO x       |

These are the entities in the original paragraph that can be identified as material names: ITO, PEDOT : PSS, polymer, PC71BM, and TiO x. Other entities such as "bulk heterojunction solar cells", "configuration", "ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC71BM / TiO x / Al" and "Al" are not material names, but rather descriptions or context.
